if not exists 
(select 1 from bcPortalPlanTypes
 where portalId = '@{pipeline().parameters.currentPortalId}'
    and portalPlanTypeStatusTypeId = 'ab727771-44c6-4e3c-bcf7-6f7c37673aaa' /*Active*/
    and planTypeId = 'a5a1b20b-bbce-425e-b4ef-04e065cf3288' /*Disaster Recovery*/)
begin
insert into bcPortalPlanTypes
(
    portalPlanTypeId,
    portalId,
    planTypeId,
    portalPlanTypeStatusTypeId,
    dateTimeCreated,
    createdById
)
values
(
    NEWID(),
    '@{pipeline().parameters.currentPortalId}',
    'a5a1b20b-bbce-425e-b4ef-04e065cf3288', /*Disaster Recovery*/
    'ab727771-44c6-4e3c-bcf7-6f7c37673aaa', /*Active*/
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    '@{pipeline().globalParameters.preparisCreatedById}'
)    
end

select portalPlanTypeId from bcPortalPlanTypes
where
portalId = '@{pipeline().parameters.currentPortalId}'
and portalPlanTypeStatusTypeId = 'ab727771-44c6-4e3c-bcf7-6f7c37673aaa' /*Active*/
and planTypeId = 'a5a1b20b-bbce-425e-b4ef-04e065cf3288' /*Disaster Recovery*/
